string.value: Operation Eliminate Red-Nosed Pirates
The resident pharmacist of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091002##k, would like to request something. I wonder what that is...

#p2091002# talked to me about the dastardly ways the #rRed-Nosed Pirates#k used to steal some herbs by attacking the ships traveling from #m250000000# to #m251000000#. He asked me to join forces with #b#p2092001##k, who's in charge of freight on #b#m251000000##k and protect it.
#b#p2092001##k seems to be very experienced here. If I work well with him, defeating the disciples of Lord Pirate should not be too difficult.

string.name: name
string.value: An Evidence of Slaying the Captain

string.name: parent
string.value: Operation Eliminate Red-Nosed Pirates
#b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be thinking of eliminating #rRed-Nosed Pirates#k... maybe there's something I can do to help. I better go see #p2092001#.

#p2092001# suspects that #r#o7130104##k of the Red-Nosed Pirates is responsible for this mess. In order to help him out, I must find a way to eliminate #o7130104#... I better eliminate #o7130104# and bring #b#t4031436##k as evidence. \n\n#i4031436##t4031436# #b#c4031436##k/20

Once I showed #p2092001# #t4031436#, he seemed very ecstatic. To see a grown man be so ecstatic makes me feel equally as good. Hopefully this will in turn transport those herbs safely to #m250000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Captain Lord Pirate
#b#p2092001##k, who's in charge of freight for #b#m251000000##k, seems to know something about #b#t4031438##k...

#p2092001# told me the location of #t4031551# is written in here, and wanted me to find #t4031551#. The box of #t4031551# is located at a relatively unknown place inside the Pirate Ship, at #bthe deck where the bellflowers are guarding#k, and I'll need #t4031437# to open it... I guess I'll have to get #b#t4031437##k first. In order to get #t4031437#, I'll have to enter the lair of Lord Pirate.\n\n#i4031551##t4031551# #b#c4031551##k/1
I opened the box of #t4031551#, took out all the treasures, and gave them to #p2092001#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Do's Book on Herbal Medicine
I heard there's a suspicious pharmacist by the name of #b#p2090004##k at #b#m250000000##k...

#p2090004# claimed that he's the true student of #p2091002# and is a great pharmacist himself. The more I look at this character, the more I feel suspicious about him... anyway, he told me he's been working on combining rare herbs found at #m250000000#, and asked me to grab some #r#o5120506#s#k and give him #b#t4000298##k along the way. \n\n#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/25

Once I gave him all the #t4000298#s needed for this, #p2090004# gave me a book that he authored, #b#t4161030##k, and told me if I bring this book to him when I visit him, he'll make the medicine for me in a heartbeat. He may not seem trustworthy, but I don't see what's wrong with asking him for a medicine every once in a while...

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Test
The Head Physical Trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091000##k, wants to test the students willing to become the Master...

#p2091000# told us the test consists of defeating both #r#o5120500# and #o6130203##k. #o5120500# and #o6130203# may be animals, but they have both been training hard to become Masters, so this may not be a easy fight...

#o5120500# #r#a38311##k 
#o6130203# #r#a38312##k

After successfully defeating #o5120500# and #o6130203#, I went back to #p2091000# to tell him the good news, only to listen to him tell me that I still have ways to go before becoming the true Master. What the, he's doing this again... is he really going to make me a Master, or what?

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Test
The Head Mental Trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091001##k, wants to test the students willing to become the Master...

To test out the skills the students have accumulated over time, #p2091001# told us to defeat both #r#o5120506##k and #r#o6130209##k. #o5120506# and #o6130209# have both mastered the art of casting spells, becoming close to Masters themselves. They may be hard to handle...

#o5120506# #r#a38321##k 
#o6130209# #r#a38322##k
After defeating 100 #o5120506#s and 100 #o6130209#s, #p2091001# told me I still have ways to go before becoming a true Master...

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Up the Lacking Ingredients
#b#p2092000##k of #b#m251000000##k told me he needed to tell me something.

#p2092000# has been short on herbs that should be sent to #p2091002# due to the dastardly ways of Lord Pirate. #p2092000# told me other herbs will be needed to replace the original herb, and asked me to gather up as much #b#t04000294##k as possible...\n\n#i4000294# #t4000294# #b#c4000294##k
I wound up giving #p2092000# #t04000294#.

string.name: name

#b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be concerned about something...

#p2092001# seemed concerned about the fact that the #o4230505#s prepared to place herbs in have instead been inhabited by an unknown creature, causing havoc around the area. He asked me to eliminate #r400 #o4230505#s#k for him.\n\n#o4230505# #r#a38341##k
After defeating 400 #o4230505#s, #p2092001# seemed very pleased. I still havce no idea, however, what exactly was inside it...

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo's Account

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master
#bTae Soo#k, the kid in charge of protecting the Peach Farm of Mu Lung, apparently experienced something very strange...

While aimlessly walking around Sky Forest, Tae Soo was ambushed by a terrifying wild bear. Almost injured, Tae Soo completely froze up, not knowing what to do, until a helping hand arrived...by the form of bear. Tae Soo wanted to know what that bear was all about, and asked me to talk to #bNo Gong#k about him.
After hearing the story on the bear, No Gong had the heavy look of concern...

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Student

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

No Gong had a student who was struck by a Goblin's spell and started attacking innocent people around the neighborhood, and his name is #bTae Roon#k... the most intelligent student No Gong had ever taught. He is currently in exile out of this town, hoping for the spells to weaken as time goes by... \n\n No Gong suspected that since he helped Tae Soo out, the spell might be weakening the grip on him, and wanted me to confirm this with #bDo Gong#k.
Do Gong told me he'll do anything to help Tae Roon out. I better go talk to Do Gong once more.

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Spell

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

Do Gong thinks Tae Roon had been weakening the grip the spell has on him through meditation, so he believes that with his own set of spells, the previously-unbreakable spell of Master Goblin might finally be broken. In order for Do Gong to do the spell, however, he'll need some items to work with... 

#i4000288# #t4000288# #b#c4000288##k/10 
#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/10 
#i4000282# #t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/50
Do Gong started casting the spell... only to no avail. I better notify this to No Gong.

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat Tae Roon

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

Since Do Gong's spell was unfortunately interfered by Master Goblin, No Gong, with sadness in his eyes, told me the following... for the sake of Tae Roon, if he ever loses it again, he told me to take him down.\n\n#o7220000# #r#a38381##k

I went to go see No Gong again after defeating Tae Roon. No Gong believed that this would actually lighten the pressure Tae Roon might have felt with the spell controlling his every move. He said this with equal parts sadness and relief. \n\nNow that I have learned the truth about Tae Roon, I better go see #bTae Soo#k once more.

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo's Reward

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

After listening to Tae Roon's story, Tae Soo felt that since he owes Tae Roon a debt of gratitude, he wanted to give him a Peach from this farm. How can I successfully give Tae Soo's Peach to Tae Roon? Maybe there's a place to drop the Peach at the #bWild Bear Area#k...

A small note of thank you on the table... after handing Tae Soo the note, he flashed a big smile so genuine he must have felt like flying. This small piece of paper may well be the truth about Tae Roon.

string.name: name
string.value: Weakening King Sage Cat

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat
The Head Mental Trainer of #bMu Lung#k, #bDo Gong#k, seems to be concerned about something...

The source of awful concern for Do Gong was Master Goblin, who over the course of thousand years have digressed from a promising Master to a bona-fide Master Goblin. Do Gong pleaded with me to defeat Master Goblin, who's responsible for tricking Tae Roon and is primed to trick his way into Mu Lung. In order to weaken Master Goblin, I'll first have to eliminate Sage Cats and recover #bcat dolls#k from the battle. \n\n#i4000289# #t4000289# #b#c4000289##k/100

I managed to defeat the Sage Cats and recovered the cat dolls. After casting spells on those cat dolls, Do Gong wanted me to head to #b#m250010503##k to see if the spells were casted right. Off to the Goblin Forest.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Goblin's Call

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat
As soon as I reach #b#m250010503##k, I can faintly hear a voice coming out of there...

Out of the blue, #rMaster Goblin#k decided to speak to me. Master Goblin seemed eager to dispell the rumors and misconceptions held towards him... is he for real?? I should head over to the #bRock Support of the Disappeared Statue#k at #bGoblin Forest 2#k as Master Goblin instructed.

Master Goblin reiterated he had no hard feelings towards Mu Lung, and that all this hatred stems from Do Gong, who's jealous of Master Goblin's mastery on spells. No way... I better talk to Master Goblin and find out myself.

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's in Trouble

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

Master Goblin, who calls himself the King Sage Cat, proclaims that he's the true Master, and althought he may have been ridiculed by Do Gong, he was willing to let it slide and offer a truce. Also wanted to offer a miracle medicine to #bDo Gong#k as a sign of truce. Well, I better give Do Gong the red marble like he said.
The stuff Master Goblin gave to Do Gong wasn't the Miracle Medicine!!! It's a POISON!!! Will Do Gong be able to survive this? I better check his pulse right now.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Goblin's Questions

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

Due to being tricked by Master Goblin, I wound up giving the Red Marble to Do Gong, poisoning him in the process. This isn't true... how can he lie to me? I better go back to see Master Goblin and ask him what's up!

Master Goblin offered to give me an #bantidoe marble#k if I manage to answer all three of questions... but the true answers were NOWHERE to be found. He NEVER meant to give me the antidote!! What should I do? I better go see Do Gong now.

string.name: name
string.value: Learning the Culture of Ariant

#m260000000#, a town built in the middle of the desert. This town feels much different from anything else I've experienced. Are the people in #m260000000# just aloof? Or not really talkative? These people are hard to start a conversation with... I hear #b#p2101005##k is researching at #m260000000#, so I better ask him for help.

#p2101005# told me the people in #m260000000# are very guarded, and that the best way to break the ice is by drinking their water from the oasis. Then they'll accept me as part of them. I better head over to the #boasis near the palace#k right now.

Returning to #p2101005# after drinking the water, he told me that'd be enough to be accepted by the people in #m260000000#, and explained to me what's going on at #m260000000#. #m260000000# seems a bit complex... I better be careful

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun the Guard at the Palace

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Make-up Kit
#b#p2101007##k, the queen of #b#m260000000##k, apparently needs something.

Queen #p2101007#, with her sensitive fairy skin acting up with the sand dust, demanded me to slay some #r#o4230600##k to make #b#t4000332##k, the most expensive, rare make-up item one can find. \n\n#i4000332# #t4000332# #b#c4000332##k/20
Once I got her #t4000332#, #p2101007# seemed quite satisfied. I wonder why she's the only fairy that puts on a heavy make-up. Other fairies don't even wear one.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea
Famous for being frivolous to a fault, the queen of #b#m260000000##k is also known for her picky taste... I better go see #b#p2101007##k.

The queen #p2101007# was complaining that the tea made with #t4000331#, considered the finest in this world, is not up to her taste. Seriously, if that expensive tea doesn't taste good, then what is? After some more complaining, she decided to drink a different tea, and asked me to get #b#t4031577##k from #b#p2012012##k of #b#m200000000##k.
When I asked #p2012012# about #t4031577#, #p2012012# gave me an awkward, disapproving look.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea

#p2012012# told me although she may not know who #p2101007# is, she didn't want to just give #t4031577# to me easily, and told me if I really wanted #t4031577#, then I'll have to eliminate #r30 #o5200000#s#k. \n\n#o5200000# #r#a39041#
I eliminated 30 #o5200000#s and went back to #p2012012#.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea

string.name: name
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

#p2101001# had an older sister who told him fun stories on a regular basis, but was dragged into the castle by the guards one day. Concerned about his sister, #p2101001# asked me to say hello to her for him if I get in the palace. Alright, I'll go in the palace as requested by #p2101001#. \n\nWait, I forgot to ask him for her name though, but I have a feeling who the #bsister of #p2101001##k is.
#p2101001#'s storytelling sister is indeed #p2101008#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter From the Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

#p2101008#, the older sister of #p2101001#. As much as #p2101001# was concerned for her safety, she was concerned for his as well. I better take this letter she wrote for #b#p2101001##k and give it to him.
#p2101001# seemed ecstatic to receive a letter from #p2101008#. He must have been concerned that the horrendous queen might really give her a hard time.

string.name: name
string.value: A Present for His Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

After receiving #p2101008#'s letter, #p2101001# wanted to get her some #t4000331# to soothe her vocal chords, which is constantly on the works thanks to all that storytelling... I better get #b#t4000331##k for the sake of #p2101001# and #p2101008#.. \n\n#i4000331# #t4000331# #b#c4000331##k/20

string.name: name
string.value: Dancer's Ringing

#p2101000# is an ambitious dancer who desires to be the best. She came up with an idea of putting on a bell on her dress, so whenever she dances, the bell would jingle, adding on to the whole experience. She felt that this will take her to stardom, and asked me to get some #b#t4000328#s#k from #r#o2100105##k. Hmmm, I knew she liked to dance, but #t4000328#? Oh well, I'll have to help her get it.\n\n#i4000328# #t4000328# #b#c4000328##k/20

string.name: name
string.value: Sword Dance

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword

#p2101000# came up with a fantastic costume with the bell ringing, but she seemed to consider that her sword is too bland, and that she needed a new, fancier knife to really pull off her best move, the sword dance. She said the only person that is talented enough to make that kind of a sword in #m260000000# is #b#p2100001##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Fancy Sword

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword

#p2100001# told me making a dancer sword at #m260000000# is very difficult, but he told me if I bring the items to decorate the sword with, then he'll consider it... they turn out to be #b#t4031568##k, #b#t4000335##k, and #b5,000 mesos#k. I better go get the materials right now.

#i4031568# #t4031568# #b#c4031568##k/4 
#i4000335# #t4000335# #b#c4000335##k/30
I have gotten all the materials required to make the Dancer Sword, along with 5,000 mesos, and gave them all to #p2100001#. With that, maybe I can get the Dancer Sword from him

string.name: name
string.value: Deliver the Fancy Sword

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword
I have received #t4031569# from #p2100001#. Unlike other swords, this blade is dull, yet light and beautifully decorated. It should look good on #p2101000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade's Fear

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller
Inside #b#m260000300##k, there's a storyteller who know so many stories that she has enough to go nonstop for the next 1,000 days; her name is #b#p2101008##k. I better go see her.

#p2101008# was unjustly dragged over to the palace simply for knowing so many stories. She seemed worried that one day, her stories might run out. For sake of her, #p2101008#, I better go to the place with the most books in Maple, #b#m222020000##k, and rent a book there.
I told #p2040052# about #p2101008#. She seemed genuinely shocked.

string.name: name
string.value: Borrowing the Book from Wiz

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

After hearing the whole story, #p2040052# decided to rent #p2101008# the book. There's also a rule in #m222020000# where any returned book should to replaced by another book, so I have to find one. Then... maybe I should put together a list of stories that #b#p2101008##k knows and make a book out of it.

When I told #p2101008# of #p2040052#'s words, she smiled brightly and told me that she has a list of stories that have already been written on the paper, so she'll give me the collection of stories. Phew, thank goodness.

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade's Storybook

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

As told by #p2040052#, #p2101008# gave me a collection of pages that she wrote stories on in a form of a book. Okay, so all I have to do is give this to #b#p2040052##k, right? Okay off to #b#m222020000##k.
#p2040052# saw the pile of pages that #p2101008# wrote, and was clearly happy with it. Hopefully this book will allow #p2101008# to concentrate on her work... I better return to #p2101008#.

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

string.name: name
string.value: The Little Prince that Loves Roses

string.name: parent
string.value: For the Little Prince

The strange boy seemed concerned about his wilting rose. A rose? Who cares about a rose? I'm more concerned about you sitting in the middle of the desert like this. Anyway, I better get him some #b#t2022155##k for his roses... but more so for him. \n\n#i2022155# #t2022155# #b#c2022155##k/5
I gave the strange boy some #t2022155#. He smiled a smile of relief. Who is this kid anyway? What's he doing here?

string.name: name
string.value: The Little Prince that Loves the Stars

string.name: parent
string.value: For the Little Prince
I remember seeing a boy sitting in the middle of the desert with a rose. He must not have been thirsty, because he kept worrying about the rose. I wonder if he's doing alright. I better go see him.

The strange boy was gazing up on the sky, then said to me in a sad tone, that he can't see a star. A star? What kind of a star is he looking at? I felt pretty sad watching him make a sad face wondering why he can't see a star, so I promised him I'll get #b#t4000333##k from #r#o2100108##k so he can see his star. \n\n#i4000333# #t4000333# #b#c4000333##k/20

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince

I told #p2040052# about the boy I saw in Nihal Desert, and he seemed shocked. He said the boy is from a folk tale that ended up here because of the crack in dimension at the Helios Tower. He said #p2101006# gets lonely fast, and he shouldn't be sitting in the desert by himself, so #p2040052# asked me to get back the book #p2101006# from him.

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 1

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

#p2101012# called himself a member of the Sand Bandits and asked me to get some tools needed to steal the queen's treasure. How did he think of creating a rope out of #b#t4000329##k? I better get some #r#o2100102##k. \n\n#i4000329# #t4000329# #b#c4000329##k/30
I gave #p2101012# 30 #t4000329#s. I know this isn't much, but maybe this helped the Sand Bandits.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 2

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

#b#p2101012##k lives outside #b#m260000000##k. He claims to be a member of the Sand Bandits, the secret organization in #m260000000#. If he's a Sand Bandit, then there's got to be a lot of things he should do for these good people. What else is there for me to do?

#p2101012# told me he'll need a poisoned needle to steal a treasure from the queen, and asked me to get #b#t4000330##k for him. Since this is for the Sand Bandits, this shouldn't be too hard to do. \n\n#i4000330# #t4000330# #b#c4000330##k/50
I gave #p2101012# all the #t4000330#s required for this. Sand Bandits must be needing a lot of stuff to do good for these people.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 3

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

Sand Bandits, the secret organization that works for the good people in #m260000000#. What can I do to help them? Since #b#p2101012##k of #b#m260010400##k is a member of the Sand Bandits, I should go talk to him.

#p2101012# told me the time is now to steal a treasure from the queen, and told me to go to the #bpalace#k. Since I can't be detected by the queen, I need to evade the security and the queen, #busing the hidden portals in the castle#k to end up on the queen's treasure chest and steal a #bring#k from there. Wait, why did he want the poisoned needle and the rope? They don't seem to be needed in this.\n\n#i4031578# #t4031578# #b#c4031578##k/1

string.name: name
string.value: Sirin Speaks

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions
Apparently #p2101012# of #b#m260010400##k is in a very angry mood. Why would he be, when I just got him the ring? What's going on?
#p2101012# said that he hid the treasure behind a rock, and someone apparently took it from him. According to him, the person responsible for this is #p2101000# the dancer. I better go talk to him.

string.name: name
string.value: True or False

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions

#p2101000# said #p2101012# is fake, and I may want to find the hideaway spot of the Red Scorpions, which should be nearby. He said only a special password can open the door, and the only revenge for me to them would be to steal their stolen treasures and give them to others... by the way, what did he mean by "I already know the password?"

string.name: name
string.value: Screwing the Red Scorpions

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions

Like #p2101000# told me to do, I went into the hideaway spot of Red Scorpions and stole some treasures from there. Now I'll have to leave this off at a random resident's house. Sirin made it clear that a house with X on it is related to Red Scorpions, and therefore not give it to them...

string.name: name
string.value: The Existence of the Secret Organization

#b#m260000000##k is famous for producing #t4011008#, but the people of #m260000000# don't seem to be wealthy, and that's because of the queen... Maybe #b#p2101000##k, who dances in the middle of the town, knows a thing or two about the queen.

When I asked #p2101000# about the queen, she started complaining about the queen's lack of humanity, and mentioned #bSand Bandits#k in the process. Apparently, Sand Bandits steal the treasures of the greedy queen and give them to the struggling folks in this town, all done in a secretive manner. A good thief? Not bad. When I told her I was interested in joining Sand Bandits, #p2101000# thought about it for a while and told me if I can find #bthe wall that has something written about Sand Bandits#k, then I may be able to find them. I better find the wall and then return to #b#p2101000##k.

I found the wall that had the symbolism of Sand Bandits written on. When I looked closer, there seems to be a clue on the Sand Bandits... A dagger, an iron hammer, a bow, an arrow? What does that mean?

string.name: name
string.value: The Man with a Bow

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sezan
The word bow written on the wall at #p2103001#... I think it's pointing at someone. I think I saw someone carrying a bow in #m260000000#... Was his name #p2101011#?

#p2101011# was really a member of the Sand Bandits. He seemed reluctant to offer me a spot, since he's seen his share of spies from the queen, and told me if I really want to be a member, then I need to get some food. Food in this case would be something like #b#t4000325##k, #b#t2010000#, and #t2010002##k, right?

#i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000# / 10#k
#i2010002# #t2010002# #b#c2010002# / 10#k
#i4000325# #t4000325# #b#c4000325# / 50#k

When I gave #p2101011# the food, he told me this does not prove that I am not a spy, and I'll have to do a lot more for #m260000000# in order to earn his trust. Fine, then I'll have to visit #p2101011# again.

string.name: name
string.value: Sezan's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sezan

Sezan told me since I brought the food, I'll have to distribute them to the good people in this town, and asked me to drop some food on a random house when no one's watching. Since the town is also full of crazy thieves stealing things from others, I'll have to find a house where it's not a thief's house.
I gave food to the suffering residents of Ariant. I think I proved my worth, but Sezan still wasn't so sure.

string.name: name
string.value: Sezan's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sezan
I have passed all of #p2101011#'s tests. Now all that I got to do is become a member of the Sand Bandits, right? I better go to #b#p2101011##k and talk to him about it.

#p2101011# said if I am a true member, even if I have a lot, I shouldn't be too caught up by it, and use that wealth to help the people at #m260000000#, and immediately asked me if I can fork over #b10000 mesos#k for the members of the Sand Bandits.

It took me a while to get that much money, but I donated 10,000 mesos to the residents of #m260000000#. That's when he told me I have now passed all of his test. That also means I have to pass other peoples' tests, too. Come to think of it, that wall of secret mentioned bow and arrows, iron hammer, and dagger.

string.name: name
string.value: The Man with the Iron Hammer

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Adin
The word iron hammer written on the wall at #p2103001#... I think it's pointing at someone. I think there's only one person in #m260000000# carrying an iron hammer... Was his name #p2101003#?

#p2101003# is also the member of the Sand Bandits. #p2101003# told me only the strongest deserve to be a member, and that I had to prove him my worth. I was told to eliminate the ferocious #r#o2100105##k... #o2100105#? I'll finish it right off the spot!\n\n#o2100105# #r#a39311##k
I eliminated #o2100105#, but #p2101003# said that I am still short of becoming the member of the Sand Bandits, and that I still won't be accepted as one.

string.name: name
string.value: Adin's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Adin

When I revisited #p2101003#, he told me I should defeat #r30 #o2100106#s#k and #r30 #o2100107#s#k and bring back #b20 #t4000326#s#k and #b20 #t4000327#s#k as proof. Then, I'll be accepted as a member of the Sand Bandits.

#o2100106# #r#a39321##k
#o2100107# #r#a39322##k

#i4000326# #t4000326# #b#c4000326# / 20#k
#i4000327# #t4000327# #b#c4000327# / 20#k
After eliminating both #o2100106# and #o2100107#, #p2101003# seemed shocked, as if he wasn't sure if I was capable of doing that. Hopefully this'll let him let me be a member of the Sand Bandits.

string.name: name
string.value: Adin's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Adin
I have passed all of #p2101003#'s test. Now I will be accepted as a member of the Sand Bandits, right? I better go talk to #p2101003#.

#p2101003# told me the Sand Bandits will need to get stronger in order to fight the queen, and told me if I could beat him, then I'll be accepted as the member of the Sand Bandits... Will I be able to defeat #p2101003#? \n\nAdin's Other Self#r#a39331##k

He may look slow and clumsy, but #p2101003# was much more powerful that I envisioned, but I still won the battle, so am I now a member of the Sand Bandits? #p2101003# told me in order to be a member of the Sand Bandits, I have to be approved by two more members. Come to think of it, other than iron hammer, #p2103001# also had bow, arrows, and dagger written on the wall.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lady with the Dagger

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ereska
The word dagger written on the wall at #p2101002#... I think it's pointing at someone. I think there's only one person in #m260000000# carrying a dagger... Was her name #p2101002#?

#p2101002# is a member of the Sand Bandits! She looked quite intimidating, but when I summoned the courage to tell her that I wanted to be a member, #p2101002# told me if I had the guts and skills to enter the queen's treasure storage room and steal a treasure from there, then she'll accept me as a member of the Sand Bandits. For more information, she said I could ask #bsomeone inside the palace#k...
Inside the palace, I asked someone who's not on the queen's side, #p2101008# the storyteller, about the treasures.

string.name: name
string.value: Ereska's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ereska

I didn't tell her anything about the Sand Bandits, and for some reason, #p2101008# told me exactly where the treasure storage room is for the queen. A hidden path underneath an unlit lamp... now all I have to do is steal #b#t4031574##k, right?\n\n#i4031574# #t4031574# #b#c4031574#/1#k
I gave Ereska the Skyloam. Ereska seemed stunned... Maybe I'll be accepted even by her.

string.name: name
string.value: Ereska's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ereska
I have passed all the tests of #p2101002#. Maybe I'll be able to become a member of the Sand Bandits. I better talk to #p2101002#, the person I can trust the most on this.

#p2101002# told me the key to being a Sand Bandit is having a hatred toward the queen, but not letting it show, while biding time for the right moment to strike... and told me the most important aspect of being a Sand Bandit is patience. Patience... that's similar to refining ores. As Ereska told me, I better make #b2 #t4011008#s#k. \n\n#i4011008# #t4011008# #b#c4011008#/2

After receiving #t4011008#, #p2101002# told me with that level of patience, I deserve to be a member of the Sand Bandits, and she told me if I passed the test from other members, then I'll be able to join them. Other members? Come to think of it... the wall also stated bow and iron hammer.

string.name: name
string.value: The True Identity of Sand Bandits
I have passed all the tests from all members of the Sand Bandits, and I have heard from each one of them that I deserve to be a member myself. Now I better head off to their secret residence.

The captain of the Sand Bandits, #b#p2101010##k, told me I have done a good job passing all the tests, and told me a story about the Sultan and the queen of #m260000000#. After he was done with the conversation, he told me to look around #m260000000# once more, and let him know when I am ready.
I have finally become a member of the Sand Bandits through #p2101010#. As a member, my job is to do my best for #m260000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: First Mission

string.name: parent
string.value: First Mission of Sand Bandits
San Bandits are here to work for the residents of #m260000000#. Now that I am a member, I should get my first mission! I better talk to #b#p2101010##k.

#p2101010# told me his plan is to steal an expensive order of silk that the queen planned to buy, and distribute them among the residents. The plan is, one of us will transform into the guard from the palace to receive the order of silk from the merchant and bring it back! He said as long as I get #b#p2101004#'s hair#k, then he'll make me a transformation potion. \n\n#i4031570# #t4031570# #b#c4031570# /#k1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun's Hair

string.name: name
string.value: Mission Complete!

string.name: parent
string.value: First Mission of Sand Bandits
Right about now, #p2101010# should be done with the Tigun Transformation Potion. I better go see #b#p2101010##k right now.

I have received the transformation potion that allows me to change to #p2101004#. It looked odd, but I guess once I drink this, I'll look like #p2101004#. I better take the #p2101004# transformation potion, head to #b#m260010600##k, and steal some #bsilk#k from #b#p2101013##k.\n\n#i4031571# #t4031571# #b#c4031571#/1#k
I have received the queen's order of silk from #p2101004# and gave them to #p2101010#. Awesome! My first mission as a Sand Bandit complete!

string.name: name
string.value: Stealing Queen's Order of Silk

The first mission as a member of the Sand Bandits is to steal an order of silk that the queen ordered. Disguised as #p2101004#, I have to go to #b#m260010600##k and get the order of silk from #b#p2101013##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter

#p2101005# told me I am now ready to make the job advancement, and told me he wanted to recommend me to #p1022000# of Victoria Island. I better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1022000##k.
I showed #p1022000# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1022000# told me he trusts #p2101005#'s opinions, and told me to drop by whenever I am ready to make the advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter!

#p2101005# told me I am now ready to make the job advancement, and told me he wanted to recommend me to #p1032001# of Victoria Island. I better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1032001##k.
I showed #p1032001# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1032001# told me he trusts #p2101005#'s opinions, and told me to drop by whenever I am ready to make the advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter!!

#p2101005# told me I am now ready to make the job advancement, and told me he wanted to recommend me to #p1012100# of Victoria Island. I better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1012100##k.
I showed #p1012100# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1012100# told me she trusts #p2101005#'s opinions, and told me to drop by whenever I am ready to make the advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter!!!

#p2101005# told me I am now ready to make the job advancement, and told me he wanted to recommend me to #p1052001# of Victoria Island. I better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1052001##k.
I showed #p1052001# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1052001# told me he trusts #p2101005#'s opinions, and told me to drop by whenever I am ready to make the advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: A Proper Reward for a Good Deed

I got bamboozled by a Red Scorpion, thinking I was helping Sand Bandits out. Good thing I noticed it before it went on for too long, and I stole some from their treasures and gave them out to others. I feel great about it, but for some reason, #bSirin#k wanted to talk to me about it.

Sirin told me I have done more good deeds that made up for helping out the Red Scorpions, and that she said it's okay for me to look for some #bcompensation#k from this. Compensation? Who's going to pay me?
As a small compensation for all that, I took some from the treasure chest. This should be enough.

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko's Concern
#b#p9110002##k is responsible for taking care of a small altar over in Mushroom Shrine. She seems to be concerned about something...

Tired of cleaning up after those pesky #o9400000#s, #p9110002# wants me to gather #b100 #t4000064#s#k. I'd hate to see the #m800000000# covered in filth, so I've decided to help her. Time to pluck some #t4000064#s!\n\n#t4000064# #b#c4000064#/100
I gave #p9110002# a whole bunch of #t4000064#s. It felt good seeing her being ecstatic over a bunch of #p9110002#s. Hopefully this will restore #m800000000#'s beauty...

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko vs Fire Raccoon
#b#p9110002##k, who resides in the Mushroom Shrine, is having a bit of trouble with Fire Racoons. I should see if I can help!

Kino Konoko tells me that the food vendors and restaurants in #m800000000# are suffering from #b#o9400001#s#k attacking their places. I better help them out. I would not want to miss out on some great food around here! Now, where can I find #o9400001#?\n\n#o9400001# #r#a43011##k
I let #p9110002# know that I took care of 100 #o9400001#s. She was ecstatic, to say the least. Hopefully that'll keep the #m800000000# food from disappearing...

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k of #b#m800000000##k has an item she really would love to have. What must that be?

It turns out that the item #p9120001# wants to have is a muffler made out of #t4000066#. A muffler made out of Foxtails. Hmm...I don't get why she'd want to wear a muffler in such warm weather, but I did promise to get her #t4000066#s, She needs 100, so I'd better get started. So, that's #b100 #t4000066#s#k... \n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/100#k
I gave #p9120001# 100 #t4000066#s. Hmmm, but this isn't as much as I thought. Can she really make a muffler out of this?

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k, who wanted to make a #t4000066# muffler, haven't finished making it. I wonder what she's lacking...

#p9120001# wanted to make a muffler out of #t4000066#, so I gave her 100 #t4000066#s. Despite the work, #p9120001# flat-out insisted that she asked for 300 all along, and demanded that I get her 200 more. I didn't need to hear that from her, but I'll have to get her 200 more... #b200 more #t4000066#s#k? That's a lot!\n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/200
I gave #p9120001# 200 #t4000066#s. Hopefully this will do.

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Coat

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#p9120001# seemed to be dissatisfied with just having a #t4000066# muffler, and wants something more. What would that be...

It turns out #p9120001# wanted not just a #t4000066# muffler, but a #t4000066# coat. Seriously, why does she need a coat at #m800000000#... This defies anyone's logic, but oh well... How am I going to gather up #b400 #t4000066#s#k?\n\n #t4000066# #b#c4000066#/400
I gave #p9120001# 400 #t4000066#s. I understand her need for pretty things, but wearing a muffler AND a coat at #m800000000#? #p9120001#'s just weird.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Dark Cloud Fox
The 'best-dressed' lady of #b#m800000000##k, #b#p9120001##k, seems to be perturbed at something...

I found #p9120001# enraged - it appears her newly-purchased fabric was destroyed by a pack of #o9400004#es. For someone as vain as she is, this is devastating. As a result, I promised her to eliminate #b100 #o9400004#es#k for her. The things I do for friends... \n\n#o9400004# #r#a43051##k
#p9120001# seemed thankful for me eliminating 100 #o9400004#s. She must have bought some new fabric already.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lantern at Mushroom Shrine
#b#p9120003##k, a proud resident of #b#m800000000##k, seems to be annoyed by something.

#p9120003# was indeed annoyed by something. She was disturbed that the #t4000222#s that are being used at #m800000000# is apparently stuck with ghosts. This isn't annoying; this is downright creepy. I better kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and get her some #b#t4000222#s#k, just the way #p9120003# said.

#o9400011# #r#a43061##k 
#t4000222# #b#c4000222#/50
I eliminated #o9400011# and got some #t4000222#s for use. The more I think about it, I think #o9400011# is much more of a dangerous presence than an unlit street at night.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Ghosts
#b#p9120003##k of #b#m800000000##k seems to have something to tell me. I wonder what it is...
#p9120003# told me I have a whole bunch of #o9400003#s around me. That's creepy, to say the least. I better kill off #b100 #o9400003#s#k right now.\n\n#o9400003# #r#a43071#
After letting #p9120003# know that I've killed 100 #o9400003#s, she tells me that there aren't any #o9400003#s hovering around me. Phew...

string.name: name
string.value: Water Goblin's Cucumber
#b#p9120003##k's farm, located at #b#m800000000##k, seems to have been robbed. What happened?

#p9120003# states that the only items stolen at her farm are the #b#t4000223#s#k, and she was very confident that it was the work of #b#o9400012##k. She asked me to eliminate 100 #o9400012#s and recover 50 #t4000223#s in the process. A monster that prefers to eat #t4000223#? Interesting, especially since most kids hate that

#o9400012# #r#a43081##k 
#t4000223# #b#c4000223#/50
After eliminating #o9400012#s and recovering a whole bunch of #t4000223#s, #p9120003# had the look of satisfaction on her face.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Blue Mushmom
#b#m800000000##k is apparently in deep trouble. I better go see #b#p9120003##k.

Apparently, out of numerous mushrooms that reside in #m800000000#, a few of them turned into mutants, ultimately becoming #b#o9400205##k. #p9120003# was worried that the town was going through a lot of trouble because of them, and wanted me to eliminate #o9400205#s. #o9400205#s are located at #b#m800010100##k. \n\n#o9400205# #r#a43091##k
I eliminated #o9400205#s as ordered and reported them to #p9120003#. Those mushrooms were indeed very hard to handle.

string.name: name
string.value: Rooney's Breaking News
#b#p9250052##k is apparently handing out flyers that contain the breaking news...
Just received a flyer from #b#p9250052##k. The flyer stated that Happyville is in a state of emergency, and for more details, I have to visit #p1022101#.
I asked #b#p1022101##k to inquire more on the stuff written on the flyer.

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Instructor Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command
In order to prove my worth as a pet trainer, I'll have to find the hidden note somewhere in the Pet Park.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Method

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command
I'm nearly there, I should visit Bartos and see if I can finally learn Bartos's secret method of handling multiple pets at once.
I finally learned the secrets of commanding multiple pets through Bartos. I shall display my talent to the world!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque, he's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the MesoGears...

+Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Discovery

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
I heard there's an adventurer over at the MesoGears underneath Bigger Ben. What mysteries does it hold? I should find out!

I spoke with the famous John Barricades' one-half of the world famous Barricade Bros. Treasure Hunting Co. He spoke to me about Subani, the legendary mage responsible for the Dark Scrolls throughout the Maple World. He believes there is something within the MesoGears that may be a treasure of his. I've agreed to help clear the way. I'll have to defeat #b50 Killa Bees, 30 Mighty Maple Eaters and 40 Fire Tusks#k so I can explore deeper into the MesoGears...
I cleared a path straight through the MesoGears, and now I can explore there in peace. When I'm ready, I can see John Barricade to continue with the next part of this adventure!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Transgression

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John Barricade is awaiting me at the Temple Hive! He's found something!

I spoke with John, and he's found a set of weird markings in the MesoGears that he can't decipher. He's mentioned that he'll need special crystals known as #bHyper Glyphs#k. I've agreed to snag #b50#k of them so he can decipher the markings. Electrophants...John thinks that the mechanism on their heads may have those Hyper Glyphs inside. I'd better be careful-I don't want to get shocked!
I got the #b50 Hyper Glyphs#k that John needed, and he's hard at work deciphering the markings. I should come back soon to see if he's finished!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Deliverance

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John has finished deciphering the markings! I need to get back to the Temple Hive now!

John and I spoke again, and something unforeseen happened. I'll have to track down #b50 MesoGears Map Pieces#k so he can put together the map! He mentioned the robots he "borrowed" for some assistance went all crazy, kept saying "#bI.AM.ROBOT#k" as they scurried into the Krakian Jungle...

Finally done! I took the pieces back to John, and he's going to start piecing the map together. However, he did come across a strange ring that passed on to me. If this was the first treasure, I wonder where the rest is...
There's a mysterious traveler in New Leaf City-he doesn't look like he's from anywhere around here. I should ask him what's going on. It could be interesting...

I spoke with Elpam Gorlab, and he's a traveler from Versal, the mirror-world of MapleStory. He traveled here to observe us and our celebration, but due to the appearance of Amoria, he was thrown off-course and landed in New Leaf City. I've agreed to help get him home by collecting #b30 Elpam Magnets#k. He's mentioned that the only creatures that have them here are the Barnard Grays. I'll have to head to Omega Sector and track them down. I didn't know that there was a mirror-world...I wonder if I have a double there...
I got the #b30 Elpam Magnets#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he gave me an Elpam Elixir, something that's sure to help me. It looks like he needs more help though...
Elpam has adjusted his compass, but he still needs my help. I should travel back and see what he needs!

I went back to Elpam for more information, and he's explained that while he was able to adjust the compass, he needs to head back to the moment of his travel glitch to get back to his home safely. I have to hunt down #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and hand them over. That's a full minute and the perfect amount of time for him to travel back. The Tick-Tock monsters should have them, since they tend to keep time. HA!
I got all #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he's given me a very nice prize he found floating in the rift...!
Icebyrd looks like he needs my help. I'd better get over to New Leaf City and see him!

I spoke with Icebyrd, and he was glad to see me. He's been trying to build the new areas, but the Gryphons have been wreaking havoc on the construction crews. If that wasn't enough, those pesky Boomers are also attacking the machines. I've agreed to help by taking out #b100 Gryphons#k (located in the Highlands) and #bBoomers#k for #b150 #t4000391##k (located in the Badlands) to show them that this city is off-limits!

Man, what a day. I de-clawed the Gryphons and defused the Boomers. Now the city can continue building in peace. Icebyrd said that they may act up again, so I should come back to see if they've been rowdy...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle - Continued
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque, he's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the Temple Hive...

*Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz - END

string.name: parent
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz
I've successfully solve all the questions but I am still curious of some things...
I was talking with Icebyrd Slimm and wow, there is more to this land of Masteria and New Leaf City than what I learned from the quiz. I want to know more of what happened in this place.
I've asked about the old fable of Masteria and Icebyrd Slimm didn't quite answer my question. Maybe when I become stronger, he will tell me more about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

I visited the Glimmer Man, and discovered that he's an ultra-powerful mage whose ability to turn his entire body into pure diamond (hence his name) has allowed him to journey to space and other inhospitable environments. Through the vast knowledge he's acquired during his explorations, he's also become somewhat of a renowned weapons creator and arms dealer.\r\nThe Glimmer Man has landed in Masteria looking for something called #b#t4031760##k, a rare element from the alternate dimension of Versal he's been dying to experiment with. To thank me for recovering some and bringing it to him, he's promised to make me a weapon of my own from it. However, I've got to also track down #b7 #t4021008#s#k and return these to him as well. Only then can he reduce the naturally unstable Materia down to a useable form. A weapon made from an otherwordly material! I wonder what it does...

I returned to the Glimmer Man and he synthesized the #b#t4031760##k and the #b7 #t4021008#s#k I gave him to form a Materia Orb. He's said his precocious friend Spindle can turn this into a weapon, so I should see him when I'm ready to make the weapon...WOOT! Spindle is currently residing in the Omega Sector. Additionally, anytime I find more White Versal Materia, I can bring it to the Glimmer Man and he'll create another Materia Orb for me so I can make another weapon!

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia Continued

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

string.name: name
string.value: Interstellar Relics

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Artifacts

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

string.name: name
string.value: Jay's Curiosity

It's weird... When I walked passed #bJay from Henesys#k the other day, he didn't answer my greetings and didn't even notice me there. It looked like he was working on some kind of riddle by himself. Let's find out what Jay is up to these days.

I don't believe I actually offered to help him on finding a historical figure just out of curiosity! I guess it won't hurt to check out the dungeon as #p1012109# requested... But I really doubt I would find anything there. It's a legend, myth, a fairy tale.
I found Bob from #m105090300# and talked with bunch of people about him. He is famous around this world.

string.name: name
string.value: Gwin's Thanks
When I passed by, #b#p1061013##k, someone I really never got to spoke with, looked like he had something to talk to me. Let's go and find out what he has to say to me.

#p1061013# was looking at #t4031447# very closely to see if I did anything to hurt him. I don't know what the deal is but he was scaring me. It makes me wonder why he is obsessed with this particular snail. I should find out by talking to #b#p1061013##k again.
#p1061013# told me what happened between him and Bob. It's amazing that a simple snail actually tried to save human being... Those little monsters we hunt aren't really little at all...

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion
The Rememberer sure would know who Bob is. He's the Rememberer! I should talk with The Rememberer to find out what he knows.
The Rememberer isn't relly being helpful today. Very slow talking, not really informative. I wonder why he is so... depres
He is MEAN! MEAN, MEAN, MEAN! He took away Bob's Snail Shell from me wtihout me letting him! Now, what do I have to do?

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion

I found it! I found Bob again! He must have escaped from The Rememberer by himself! I feel really terrible that I let this kind of things happen. I am going back to The Rememberer to tell him to lighten up.

I don't think The Rememberer gets the whole idea of me doing this. Bob may be just another monster but I know what is right or wrong. And I am going to pay back just the way he did to me. I need to get 1 #b#t4000019##k other than Bob's to pull this off.
I got him! The Remeberer will always remember this day. The day he got tricked by me! Ok. I should stop doing things like this though.

string.name: name
string.value: Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days
Grendel The Really Old... He lives deep in the forest of Ellinia. Since he's really old, he has to know SOMETHING about Bob. I shall see him now.

Grendel The Really Old was talking out of himself but I got to make him hear what I had to say. He is getting glasses. I hope his eyesight isn't too bad to recognize Bob... After all, Grendel is probably the oldest guy in this world.

Grendel The Really Old got very mad at me for hitting Bob to make him go into his shell. I knew he would know something but never would have guessed they were old friends. I guess I owe Bob a big apology. But how am I going to be able to do that to a snail, especially if he's not coming out from his shell?

string.name: name
string.value: Cody's Confession

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Approval

string.name: name
string.value: Blackbull's Mistake

string.name: name
string.value: Bruce's Research
Bruce, the monster researcher, might know something. Maybe he can tell me how old Bob actually is. If I get to know how old he is, wouldn't that be a discovery of something remarkable?
He does seem to know something about his age but he looks spooked. I shouldn't hesitate to ask him what is wrong!

Wow... Bruce told me that Bob's age is incalculable. This is getting serious, isn't it. A snail that even professional monster researcher can't tell the age. Maybe he was right about asking me to go see Winston. Maybe an archeologist knows more about the history and the age issue than Bruce.

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism
This is a wild guess but... Wouldn't Dances with Balrog know a little bit about Bob? Who knows, I heard that he likes snails. Maybe I will go check with him.
I didn't know Dances with Balrog likes to EAT the snails... Now, what am I suppose to do?! It doesn't look like he is going to give me back Bob's Snail Shell anytime soon...
I had to take off from Dances with Balrog. Who can STAND all that endless talking? I should figure out a way to get Bob back other than talking him through...

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: A Word to the Wise

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
I hear that Old Man Tom has been hearing noises from the old Prendergast Mansion on the outskirts of New Leaf City. A haunted house? Sounds like the perfect Halloween adventure!

Old Man Tom told me about the haunted Prendergast Mansion. Apparently, the doors won't open for just anyone... I've got to figure out how to get in. Tom mentioned that the toymaker Prendergast used to hold parties for kids for holidays, including Halloween costume parties around this time of year. Maybe if I wear a costume I can get in! Hmmm... Now where can I buy one?

I made it into the old Prendergast Mansion, against the advice of Old Man Tom. I wonder why he's so dead set on keeping people out of the house? Maybe if I explore the house, I can find out more about what happened here...

string.name: name
string.value: The Past in the Present

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
Jonas gave me his Toy Workshop Key. He wants me to find someone who will keep it safe and ensure that his twisted toys can't escape his house.

Turns out Old Man Tom is Thomlin Prendergast, Jonas' younger brother. I gave him Jonas' Toy Workshop key to keep. He gave me Sophilia's Necklace, for helping put the spirits in Prendergast Mansion to rest.

string.name: name
string.value: A Cold Hearth
I heard there's an old butler in the Haunted House. Maybe he needs help cleaning it...

I spoke with Edmunds, Butler of the Prendergast Estate. It seems that he' run out of #t4000018# to heat the house, which would explain the chill. I've agreed to help him out and bring back #b60 #t4000018##k so he can refill the fireplaces throughout the house and re-heat the mansion.
I brought back #b60 #t4000018##k to Edmunds; he can get the fireplaces going again now. Hmmm... It seems like there are quite a few fireplaces around this labyrinthine house.

string.name: name
string.value: Eat This!
I keep seeing these fireplaces around the house. I wonder if they lead anywhere...maybe Edmunds knows? He mentioned something about a key. I should press him a bit more.

My hunch was right. The fireplaces are interconnected through the mansion's Chimney; perhaps I can use them as an alternate way of navigating through the house. However, they're locked and Edmunds holds the only key. He will reluctantly give me the key if I collect #b20 of each type of Gummy Slimes#k. There's Red, Green, Purple and Orange ones; so I'll need to hunt all over the house to get them. It'll be tempting to eat them first.

Edmunds reluctantly gave me the Omni Key after I collected the Gummy Slimes for him. With it, I can enter the fireplaces throughout the house and the Chimney to which they all connect. Hmmm... who knows where all these fireplaces lead?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Delivery
There's a beautiful woman in the Prendergast house that looks mildly annoyed... perhaps I should speak with her.

Man! I spoke-no, tried to speak with Ludmilla, and she wouldn't give me the time of day until I agreed to get her #b5 slices of #t2022190##k for Jonas from Olde Sapp Village. A bit strange that she referred to New Leaf City as that, but Miki should have them at the potion shop. What a cranky woman...

Well, I got Ludmilla her #b#t2022190##k, and learned a bit about Jonas and her love...for his money. No wonder Edmunds hates her. I should press that woman for more info about what's going on around here.

string.name: name
string.value: Family Jewels
Oh...looks like Ludmilla is not quite done with me yet. I'd better head back and see what that nag wants now...

I spoke with Ludmilla, and big surprise---her Cherry Pie Ghoulash didn't lure Jonas out. I think he probably pushed a bookcase in front of the door to ensure he never sees her again, but that's just a theory. At any rate, it looks like now her prized jewelry has mysteriously disappeared. She thinks Sophilia's taken it, but I'm not sure if I buy that, seeing as how she's...not around to do that. I have to gather #b20 #t4031769#s#k and #b10 #t4031770#s#k and bring them back to her. The woman complains way too much... sheesh.
I found Ludmilla's beloved jewelry for her. In return she gave me a worn, but well-loved doll. It's seen better days, but it has charm. Someone is probably looking for this...

string.name: name
string.value: A Lost Girl
There's a girl wandering around the Prendergast Mansion. I wonder what she's looking for?

Sophilia is looking for her favorite toy - the very first doll her father made for her when she was a child. She seems to have been looking for it for quite awhile. She mentioned something about Ludmilla having a history of hiding her toys. If I can find Sophilia's doll for her, maybe I can put her spirit at ease.
I gave Sophilia back her favorite doll. She was so happy to get it back that she gave me some of her favorite candy.

string.name: name
string.value: A Father's Love
Jonas gave me a new doll he made to give to his daughter. I don't think Sophilia'll like it as much her favorite one, but I guess I should give it to her anyway, per her father's wishes.
I gave Sophilia the new doll her father made. It made her sad. She asked me give Annabelia, the first doll Jonas made for her, back to her father.
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

string.name: name
string.value: The M-Files
I heard there's a MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) agent in the Phantom Forest! I should investigate what he's investigating!

I spoke with MBI Agent Falcon. He's on the trail of a dangerous specter, but it looks like that crafty ghost gave him the slip by scattering his #b#t4031764#s#k all over the place. I've agreed to collect #b50#k of them so he can continue the hunt!
I tracked down all 50 of Agent #b#t4031764#s#k that he asked for! In return, he's given me Smores! Mmm...if only he had a napkin...

string.name: name
string.value: File Under Incomplete
MBI Agent Falcon is still snooping around the old Haunted House, even after I helped him find some of the Paranormal Activity Report Pages! I wonder why... maybe he still needs help.

Looks like MBI Agent Falcon spoke too soon... 50 pages led him to the wrong, uh, dead guy... but he thinks that if I collect #b100#k more of them, he'll be able to catch Mr. Bones for sure! Whew... 100 pages. I wonder how many pages in total were in his original report?
I tracked down all of the 100 more #t4031764#s#k Agent Falcon requested! Now he can finally go track Mr. Bones... I hope.

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
Agent Falcon is still hanging out in front of the Haunted House?! Doesn't he have other ghosts to catch, myths to debunk? Maybe I should go see if something's wrong...

I'm starting to think that Agent Falcon spends too much time writing reports, and not enough time doing actual investigative work! The elusive Mr. Bones turns out to be Prendergast, the former owner of this house! Falcon wants me to find Jonas in the Haunted House, give him this Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to fill out, and return the completed form to him.
I got my questionnarie from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

string.name: name
string.value: The Infernal Toy Machine
I keep hearing the groans and bellows of machinery echoing through the house. What is making this racket? Is it where these infernal toys are coming from?

I found Jonas Prendergast in his Toy Workshop at the top of the house, in front of a huge toy machine which seems to be the source of all these infernal toys! It seems that his machine is not functioning properly. If I collect #b50 Firewood#k, #b25 Screws#k, and #b25 Loaded Springs#k, Jonas can build the replacement part to get his machine working properly again. I know that the Rocking Horses will have the #bFirewood#k and the Psycho Jacks will have the #bScrews and Loaded Springs#k. I've got to get what Jonas needs-perhaps this will stop it from churning out all these crazy toys!
I collected the parts Jonas needed to fix his machine. I hope I haven't simply helped a madman create more of his messed up toys.

string.name: name
string.value: In Her Likeness
Looks like Jonas fixed the machine... yet it's still cranking out these crazy toys. Maybe he is bonkers. Or maybe he needs some more help.

Looks like Jonas needs help building a new doll, a more perfect likeness of Sophilia. I don't think he realizes she's dead. In any case, I have to collect #b30 Locks of Doll's Hair, 10 Heartstoppers, 10 Maple Candies, and 10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Why the candies? I may never know...
I collected everything Jonas needed to build his new doll in the likeness of his daughter. I have to say though... it looks nothing like her.
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.

Jonas gave me all of his Toymaker Gear in return for helping him destroy his twisted creations. He also gave me the key to his Toy Workshop, asking me to give it to someone who will help keep it safe and find a way to restore the Prendergast name.

string.name: name
string.value: Psycho Jack

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Psycho Jacks#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think.
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Sophilia Doll

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Sophilia Dolls#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. But they are scary looking for sure...
cI destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Nightmare#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. Or is it?
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Halloween : Entering the house
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
I got my questionnarie from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

I gave Agent Falcon's Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to Jonas and had him fill it out. Finding him in the labyrinthine mansion was the hard part... Jonas was actually quite cooperative, especially for a spirit. In any case, I returned the completed form to Falcon, who was ecstatic that he didn't have to set foot inside the creepy old mansion again.

string.name: name
string.value: Eat This!
I keep seeing these fireplaces around the house. I wonder if they lead anywhere...maybe Edmunds knows? He mentioned something about a key. I should press him a bit more.

My hunch was right. The fireplaces are interconnected through the mansion's Chimney; perhaps I can use them as an alternate way of navigating through the house. However, they're locked and Edmunds holds the only key. He will reluctantly give me the key if I collect #b20 of each type of Gummy Slimes#k. There's Red, Green, Purple and Orange ones; so I'll need to hunt all over the house to get them. It'll be tempting to eat them first.

Edmunds reluctantly gave me the #dOmni Key#k after I collected the Gummy Slimes for him. With it, I can enter the fireplaces throughout the house and the Chimney to which they all connect. Hmmm... who knows where all these fireplaces lead?

string.name: name
string.value: Smores No More
MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) Agent Falcon has been standing in front of the Prendergast Mansion for quite some time. Maybe I should go see why he's still loitering around.

Looks like the bumbling MBI Agent Falcon just can't get a break. Just when he was ready to pack up and leave to report the findings for his Halloween mission, a mysterious little boy appeared and stole all the Smores Falcon had cooked up for his colleagues! Falcon has agreed to pay you 100,000 mesos (from his Agency discretionary account) if you recover #b25#k of his #bSmores#k for him. Easy money - or is it? The Smores look pretty tasty... I guess I'll have to try not to eat them myself as I collect them!

I collected Agent Falcon's #bSmores#k for him... they were a bit dirty but still good, so his colleagues back at the MBI Agency should be happy! In return, Falcon paid me the 100,000 mesos he promised. He also gave me some old medicine bottles that he'd found lying outside the house. They look pretty potent...

string.name: name
string.value: Dinner Fixins'
It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins'... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <CVS>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #bAllowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!
